text: Guys we have our brand new app that is yet to be published but available to connect HubSpot with slack and microsoft team.  We would appreciate if you give it a try. Very simple just install the app called "<http://FlashCX.ai|FlashCX.ai>" from Microsoft Teams apps or for slack by going here <https://flashcx.ai>
make sure to cross post this to our <#C0121KGC6RM|showcase> channel. As this type of post is more appropriate over in that channel :slightly_smiling_face:
